element.name: spl-ctrl_threatlist_options
element.key: Threat List Settings

element.name: name
element.label: Name
element.key: The threat list name.

element.name: type
element.label: Type
element.key: The type of threat list (e.g., "malware").

element.name: description
element.label: Description
element.key: The threat list description.

element.name: url
element.label: URL
element.key: The threat list URL.

element.name: weight
element.label: Weight
element.key: The threat list weight.

element.name: interval
element.label: Interval
element.key: The interval at which to download the threat list.

element.name: post_args
element.label: POST arguments
element.key: POST arguments to be passed to the URL.

element.name: eai:acl.app
element.label: App
element.key: entity['eai:acl']['app'] or ""

element.name: spl-ctrl_parsing_options
element.key: Parsing Options

element.name: delim_regex
element.label: Delimiting regular expression
element.key: A delimiter used to split lines in a threat list.

element.name: extract_regex
element.label: Extracting regular expression
element.key: A regular expression used to extract fields from individual lines of a threat list.

element.name: fields
element.label: Fields
element.key: A transforms.conf-style expression used to rename or combine fields.

element.name: ignore_regex
element.label: Ignoring regular expression
element.key: A regular expression used to IGNORE lines in a threat list.

element.name: skip_header_lines
element.label: Skip header lines
element.key: The number of header lines to skip when processing the threat list (should be "1" for lookup tables).

element.name: spl-ctrl_download_options
element.key: Download Options

element.name: retry_interval
element.label: Retry interval
element.key: Time to wait between download retry attempts, in seconds.

element.name: site_user
element.label: Remote site user
element.key: A username to use in remote authentication, if required (must correspond to the name of a Splunk secure stored credential).

element.name: retries
element.label: Retries
element.key: The maximum number of download retry attempts.

element.name: timeout
element.label: Timeout
element.key: The time to wait before regarding a download attempt as failed, in seconds.

element.name: spl-ctrl_proxy_options
element.key: Proxy Options

element.name: proxy_server
element.label: Proxy Server
element.key: A proxy server, if required.

element.name: proxy_port
element.label: Proxy Port
element.key: A proxy port, if required.

element.name: proxy_user
element.label: Proxy User
element.key: A proxy user (must correspond to the name of a Splunk secure stored credential).
